ref.mixed-citation:
Mockus TE
Shwetank
Lauver MD
CD4 T cells control development and maintenance of brain-resident CD8 T cells during polyomavirus infection. PLoS Pathog 2018; 14: e1007365. 30372487

note.p: This work shows that brain CD4 T cells are pivotal to the development, maintenance and effector function to reinfection of CD8 bTrm.
